CustomFieldTranslation.name: Affl_ProgEnroll_Set_Role__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: Indicates whether to specify a Role for the Affiliation created with a Program Enrolment. If enabled, set the Affiliation's Role to the value specified in the related setting, Affil Role When Create Prog Enrol. If disabled, don't specify a Role.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Affil Set Role When Create Prog Enrol
